abstract: Yahoo, owner of the second-most popular U.S. Internet search engine, agreed to buy Arabic-language Internet venture Maktoob.com as it seeks to enter the Middle East market.
snippet: Yahoo, owner of the second-most popular U.S. Internet search engine, agreed to buy Arabic-language Internet venture Maktoob.com as it seeks to enter the Middle East market.
lead_paragraph: Yahoo, owner of the second-most popular Internet search engine in the United States behind Google, agreed to buy Arabic-language Internet venture Maktoob.com as it seeks to enter the Middle East market, Bloomberg News reported.

headline.main: Yahoo Buys Maktoob.com in Mideast Push
